testcase.name: The Dietician lands into Dietician home page after Sign in
testcase.system-out: Given The dietician is on dietician HOME PAGE...............................passed When The Dietician fills valid username, password...........................passed When clicks the logged in as Dietician option...............................passed When clicks the Sign IN button..............................................passed Then The page will be re directed to the Dietician homepage and the username will display as Logged in as Dietician Name.passed

testcase.name: The Dietician Home page TOP PANEL section
testcase.system-out: Given The dietician is on dietician HOME PAGE Top Panel Section.............passed When The Dietician Home Page contains company logo and an image.............passed Then The dietician will see logo and image..................................passed When The Dietician Home page contains few clickable header options such as HOME,NEW PATIENT,MY PATIENT,DIET PLAN.passed Then The dietician will be re directed to the respective pages upon a click.passed

testcase.name: Body of the Dietician Home Page
testcase.system-out: Given dietician is on body of dietician HOME PAGE...........................passed When The Dietician Home page contains Company banner and important Announcements.passed Then The dietician will see all the important announcements upon login......passed

testcase.name: The dietician Home page SIGN OUT
testcase.system-out: Given dietician is Signing Out..............................................passed When The Dietician home page top panel contains a SIGN OUT clickable button.passed Then The Dietician Signs out of the portal upon the click...................passed

testcase.name: Dietician is on New PATIENT page
testcase.system-out: Given The Dietician lands on the New Patient page...........................passed When the dietician clicks on the New Patient clickable header option in Home Page.passed Then The dietician will be re directed to New Patient page from Dietician home page.passed

testcase.name: Filling New Patient Data
testcase.system-out: Given Dietician is on New PATIENT page......................................passed When The dietician fills the patient's FULL NAME............................passed When The dietician fills the patient's date of birth mm dd yyyy.............passed When The dietician fills the patient's height ___ft___in....................passed When The dietician fills the patient's weight _____lbs.....................passed When the dietician fills the patient's Address Line 1.......................passed When The dietician fills the patient's Address line 2.......................passed When the dietician clicks the country dropdown and selects the respective patient's country.passed When the dietician fills the patient's City Name............................passed When the dietician fills the patient's State name...........................passed When the dietician fills the patient's Postal Code..........................passed When the dietician fills the patient's Email Id.............................passed When the dietician fills the patient's 10 digit phone number................passed When The dietician clicks the update button.................................passed Then the dietician will get an alert on screen saying new patient details updated.passed When the dietician clicks on the update health conditions button............passed Then the dietician will be re directed to the update health conditions page.passed

testcase.name: filling New Patient data fails(-ve)
testcase.system-out: Given the system doesnt accept the new patient data.........................passed When the dietician fills the new patient's first name and last name which are already in records.passed Then the dietician will get an alert on screen saying same first name and last name exists.passed When the dietician doesnt fill 10 digits in the mobile number tab...........passed Then the dietician will get an alert on screen saying enter valid mobile number.passed When the dietician doesnt fill all the tabs in the form.....................passed Then the dietician will get an alert on screen saying fill all the tabs in the form.passed When the dietician doesnt fill valid 5 digit postal code....................passed Then the dietician will get an alert on screen saying enter valid 5 digit postal code.passed When the dietician doesnt fill valid email address..........................passed Then the dietician will get an alert on scree saying enter valid email address.passed When the dietician fills the first name and last name as alphanumeric.......passed Then the dietician will get an alert on screen saying invalid first name and last name should contain alphabets only.passed

testcase.name: Dietician fills Patient Age,Height and Weight Data
testcase.system-out: Given Dietician is on New Patient Data page.................................passed When The dietician fills the patient's date of birth mm dd yyyy.............passed When The dietician fills the patient's height ___ft___in....................passed When The dietician fills the patient's weight _____lbs.....................passed

testcase.name: User trying to book an Appointment
testcase.system-out: Given User is in Book an Appointment page...................................passed When User fills Patient Name column.........................................passed When user fills Mobile Number Column........................................passed When User selects the required date from the calendar displaying date and day.passed When User clicks available time slot for the selected date..................passed When the User clicks on the BOOK button.....................................passed Then User appointment gets booked and the screen will display an alert saying Your Appointment is booked.passed

testcase.name: Dietician is on the Dietician Homepage Dashboard
testcase.system-out: Given Dietician logged in successfully to the Dietician website.............passed When Dietician verifes Dashboard Left Side Bar..............................passed Then User can see Upcoming Events section in left side bar..................passed When Dietician Verifies Upcoming Event Items................................passed Then Dietician can see the Items of Upcoming Events section in left side bar.passed When Dietician verifies Dashboard Top Right Side Bar........................passed Then User can see Banner or Announcements section in top right side bar.....passed When Dietician verifies Dashboard Bottom Right Side Bar.....................passed Then Dietician can see the ratio graph of enrolled patients in bottom right side bar Recovery rate.passed When Dietician Verifies Total Patient.......................................passed Then Dietician can see the Total Patient count..............................passed When Dietician verifies Verify New Patient..................................passed Then Dietician can see the New Patient count................................passed When Dietician Verifies Recovered Patient...................................passed Then Dietician can see Recovered Patient count..............................passed When Dietician Verifies Incoming Patient History............................passed Then Dietician can see the comparison graph in Incoming Patient History....passed

testcase.name: The dietician validates search filter option and searches the desired patient
testcase.system-out: Given The dietician is on the Generated Diet Plans page.....................passed When the dietician fills the search fields such as patients name or email address or phone number.passed When The dietician hits the search button...................................passed Then the dietician will be re directed to the search result page with similar inputs.passed

testcase.name: options in My Account (User)Menu page after login
testcase.system-out: Given User is on home page after login......................................passed When Clicks My account icon on the menu bar.................................passed Then Account displays few clickable options which will be redirected to their respective pages.passed When user clicks on Test Reports option.....................................passed Then user can see the Test reports..........................................passed When user clicks on Diet Plans option.......................................passed Then user can see all the Diet Plans........................................passed When user clicks on Previous Visits.........................................passed Then user can see all their Previous visits.................................passed When user clicks on Upcoming visits.........................................passed Then user can see all the Upcoming visits...................................passed When user clicks on BOOK AN APPOINTMENT.....................................passed Then user will be redirected to Book an Appointment page....................passed When user clicks on Services................................................passed Then user can see all the services provided.................................passed When user clicks on Recipes.................................................passed Then user can see all the recipes available.................................passed
